subject: VENZ
name: Beginning Spanish
info: Essential Spanish for real-life, everyday situations. Stresses communicative competency. Simultaneous work on reading, speaking, listening, and writing.

subject: VENZ
name: Beginning Spanish
info: Reading, speaking, listening, writing.prereq: Span 1001

subject: VENZ
name: Intermediate Spanish
info: Spanish grammar, conversation.prereq: Span 1002

subject: VENZ
name: Intermediate Spanish
info: Spanish grammar, conversation.prereq: Span 1003

subject: VENZ
name: Spanish Comp & Communication
info: Development of communication skills. Comprehending written/spoken texts. Speaking, reading, and writing in Spanish, beyond intermediate level.

subject: VENZ
name: Span: Adv Conver and Comp
info: Reading, listening, writing.

subject: VENZ
name: Span: Adv Communication Skills
info: Challenging points of grammar. Written communication of various styles and in various fields.

subject: VENZ
name: Advanced Business Spanish
info: Challenging points of grammar. Written communication of various styles and in various fields of business.

subject: VENZ
name: Cross-Cultural Comm: Eng
info: Helps students understand cultural differences and develop sensitivity/curiosity about issues related to cultural diversity and cross-cultural understanding. Taught in English.

subject: VENZ
name: Geography of Venezuela: Eng
info: Geographical placement of Venezuela in its international context. Outstanding physical features. Relationship between territory of Venezuela and its significant socioeconomic features.

subject: VENZ
name: Latin American Folklore: Eng
info: Folklore of countries of Spanish America. Relation between original elements and later influences. Development of folklore as historical process. Music/oral tradition. Taught in English.

subject: VENZ
name: International Business: Eng
info: Problems faced by firms engaging in international activities. Patterns in contemporary international business. History, culture, commerce, exchange, markets, corporate strategies. Taught in English.

subject: VENZ
name: International Economics: Eng
info: Theory of international trade, commercial policy, balance of payments, international monetary issues. Comparative advantage, exchange rates, protectionism, open-economy, fiscal/monetary policies, common markets, free-trade areas.

subject: VENZ
name: International Finance: English
info: International financial environment. Tools/techniques for international monetary issues. Functioning of foreign exchange, capital and money markets. Portfolio diversification, multinational capital budgeting, import-export financing, direct investment, banking.

subject: VENZ
name: Tropical Ecology: English
info: Function of tropical ecosystems. Different biological/environmental dynamics of area between Tropic of Capricorn and Tropic of Cancer. American/Venezuelan tropical ecosystems. Field assignments.

subject: VENZ
name: Field Botany in Andes: English
fullname: Field Botany in the Andes in English
info: Flora of Venezuelan Andes, its diversity, ecology, and geographical distribution. Morphology, identification of plant characteristics, ethno-botany, natural history of Andean vegetation. Fieldwork assignments.

subject: VENZ
name: Nutrition in Lat Amer: ENG
info: Study abroad course

subject: VENZ
name: Nutrition in Lat Amer: SPAN
info: Study abroad course

subject: VENZ
name: Cross-Cultural Comm: Span
info: Cultural differences when dealing with people from different cultures. Issues related to cultural diversity and cross-cultural understanding.prereq: Two yrs college-level Spanish

subject: VENZ
name: International Economics: Span
info: Theories of international trade, commercial policy, balance of payments, and international monetary issues. Comparative advantage, exchange rates, protectionism, open-economy, fiscal/monetary policies, common markets, free-trade areas.

subject: VENZ
name: Span: Art of Reading Lit Texts
fullname: The Art of Reading Literary Texts
info: Major current theoretical approaches to literary texts. Contemporary categories of analysis/methodology. Literary sociology, psychological critique, semiology, comparative literature.

subject: VENZ
name: Latin American Art
info: Panoramic view of Latin American art from pre-historic times to the present day. Emphasizes Venezuelan art production in its historical, political, and social context and relating it to other Latin American countries.

subject: VENZ
name: Intro: Hispanic Linguistics
fullname: Introduction to the Study of Hispanic Linguistics
info: Concepts and operative terms of linguistics, nature/organization of language. Emphasizes phonological/grammatical analysis. Origin/nature of linguistic transformation.prereq: Two yrs college-level Spanish

subject: VENZ
name: Span: Cervantes' Don Quixote
fullname: The Spain of Cervantes' Don Quixote: History and Fiction
info: Analysis of Don Quixote as crossroad of literary eras/genres, visions of the world, and attitudes towards life, and as synthesis of styles and an encounter of two centuries.prereq: Adv-lev written/spoken Span

subject: VENZ
name: Field Botany in Andes: Spanish
fullname: Field Botany in the Andes in Spanish
info: Introduction to flora of Venezuelan Andes, its diversity, ecology, and geographical distribution. Morphology, identification of plant characteristics, ethno-botany. Natural history of Andean vegetation. Fieldwork assignments.

subject: VENZ
name: Span: Span-American Literature
fullname: Spanish-American Literature: Aspects of Prose and Fiction
info: Several writers whose work has become essential for contemporary Spanish American literature. Critical reading of various works. Background knowledge of authors, and of their work and historical context.prereq: Two yrs col-lev Span

subject: VENZ
name: Natural Resource Econ: ENG
info: Study abroad course

subject: VENZ
name: Natural Resource Econ: SPAN
info: Basic economic concepts most relevant to natural resources, factors affecting them. Property rights, conservation, regulations, government policy, and evaluation of resources.

subject: VENZ
name: NRES:Natural Resource Devlpmnt
info: Organization/development of agriculture/mining in Latin America, from colonial era to present. Socio-political/economic ramifications of natural resources, their exploitation covering several countries.

subject: VENZ
name: Sustainable Tropical Ag: SPAN
info: Economics of tropical agriculture development. Potential for developing world trade and for improving standards of living in areas dependent on production of tropical agricultural products.

subject: VENZ
name: Sustainable Tropical Ag: ENG
info: Study abroad course

subject: VENZ
name: Hist: History of Venezuela
info: Survey of Venezuela's historical processes, fundamental historical problems.  Conquest, colonization, independence, 19th/20th centuries.prereq: Two yrs col-lev Span

subject: VENZ
name: TESL:Curriculum & Material Dev
info: Applications of theories, principles, and current research related to second language acquisition, instructional techniques, and materials relevant to development of TESOL curriculum. Emphasizes teaching students whose English proficiency is limited.

subject: VENZ
name: TESL: Applied Linguistics
info: Applications of theories, principles, and current research related to second language acquisition. Instructional techniques/materials relevant to development of TESOL curriculum. Emphasizes teaching students whose English proficiency is limited.

subject: VENZ
name: TESL: Testing & Evaluation
info: Discussion, review, and critique of instruments of evaluation for English language acquisition. Selection/development of assessment instruments valid for (a) placing students at appropriate levels, (b) evaluating progress toward goals, and (c) grading promoting students.

subject: VENZ
name: TESL:Meth Teach Eng Proficient
info: Identifying/applying major TESL methodologies to needs of students with various cultural/language backgrounds, ages, and learning styles. Emphasizes differentiating teaching English to native speakers and to speakers of other languages.

subject: VENZ
name: Tropical Ecology: Spanish
info: Function of tropical ecosystems as related to natural vegetation. Different biological/environmental dynamics of area between Tropic of Capricorn and Tropic of Cancer. Emphasizes American/Venezuelan tropical ecosystems.

subject: VENZ
name: Cultural Anthropology: Eng
info: Study abroad course.

subject: VENZ
name: Cultural Anthropology
info: Diversity/universality of culture from anthropological point of view. Concepts of culture. Representative cases that demonstrate human adaptation in its diverse variations. Diversity of values/lifestyles. Aspects of pre-Hispanic and contemporary Venezuelan Andean culture.

subject: VENZ
name: Span: Caribbean Literature
info: Aspects of Caribbean culture related to development of literature of the region. Caribbean literature within context of Latin American literature.  Analytical strategies for studying texts.prereq: Two yrs col-lev Span

subject: VENZ
name: History of Spanish Language
info: Evolution of the Spanish language starting from vulagate Latin and viewing its major synchronic states. Languages that influenced the formation of Spanish. Popular vocabulary items, educated/semi-educated language features.

subject: VENZ
name: Latin American Politics: Eng
fullname: Latin American Politics and Civilizations: Eng
info: Study abroad course.

subject: VENZ
name: Pol:Politics & Society: Lat Am
info: Panoramic study of Latin American culture. Elements of global politics. Latin America from cultural point of view. Development of Latin American civilization beginning with conquest/colonization. Formation of Latin American political systems.prereq: Two yrs col-lev Span

subject: VENZ
name: Span:Lat Am Film Critcsm, Appr
fullname: Film Criticism and Appreciation in Latin America
info: Latin American culture through eyes of outstanding Latin American filmmakers. Aesthetics/language of cinema. Emphasizes four most important Latin American film industries: Mexico, Cuba, Argentina and Venezuela. Overview of other productions.prereq: Two yrs col-lev Span

subject: VENZ
name: Span:Span-Am Civ: Mod Lat Am
info: Summary of history of countries of Latin America. Pre-Hispanic indigenous cultures, principal features of colonial society. Analysis of socio-cultural situation of Latin American countries in 20th century. Emphasizes artistic developments.prereq: Two yrs college-level Spanish

subject: VENZ
name: Span:Lat Am Cultural Discourse
info: Essential Latin American texts on culture with relation to important works on universal culture. How to distinguish between various historic/cultural currents. Contributions of major Latin American thinkers, diverse sources of principal/cultural systems of Latin America.prereq: Two yrs col-lev Span

subject: VENZ
name: Geography of Venezuela: Span
info: Venezuelan geography in its international context. Outstanding physical features. Socioeconomic patterns.prereq: Two yrs college-level Spanish

subject: VENZ
name: Span: Education in Venezuela
info: Nature/problems of education in Venezuela. Historical precedents, evolution of the system. Philosophical, cultural, and pedagogical assumptions of national education in Venezuela. The system in its current form.prereq: Two yrs col-lev Span

subject: VENZ
name: Critical Writing
info: Critical Writing course offered in Merida, Venezuela.

subject: VENZ
name: Latin American Folklore: Span
fullname: Folklore in Latin America in Spanish
info: Principal manifestations of folklore of various countries of Spanish America. Emphasizes process of syncretism. Original elements related to later influences. Development of folklore as historical process. Music, oral tradition.prereq: Two yrs college-level Spanish

subject: VENZ
name: Span:Children's Literature
info: Critical analysis of children's literature. Theoretical aspects from different points of view. Set of criteria for evaluating a variety of authors and their work.prereq: Two yrs col-lev Span

subject: VENZ
name: Spanish Linguistics
info: Present state of theory, research, and application of linguistics to Spanish speaking world. Variation and linguistical changes. Analysis of Spanish speech/writing modes.

subject: VENZ
name: International Finance: Spanish
info: International financial environment. Tools/techniques for international monetary issues. Functioning of foreign exchange. Capital/money markets, portfolio diversification, multinational capital budgeting, import-export financing, direct investment, banking.

subject: VENZ
name: Mgmt:Cross-Cultural Management
info: Strategies for overcoming cultural differences in business environment, from perspective of management. Issues of cultural diversity.

subject: VENZ
name: International Business: Span
info: Problems faced by firms engaging in international activities. Major currents/patterns in contemporary international business. History, culture, commerce, exchange, markets, corporate strategies.

subject: VENZ
name: Comparative Constitutional Law
info: Course offered in Merida, Venezuela.

subject: VENZ
name: Span: Psycholinguistics
info: Psycholinguistics as a science. Contemporary theoretical models explaining development/acquisition of language. Concepts of language pathology.prereq: Two yrs col-lev Span

subject: VENZ
name: Span: Sociolinguistics
info: Introduction to study of linguistic phenomena that are related to social factors. Language-society relationship in the Venezuelan environment. Builds on studies by linguists of Venezuela.prereq: Two yrs col-lev Span

subject: VENZ
name: Span Phonology & Phonetics
fullname: Structure of Spanish: Phonology and Phonetics
info: Theoretical background in phonetics. Practice in oral articulation. Differences between Spanish spoken in Spain and in Hispanic America. Emphasizes Spanish spoken in Venezuela.prereq: Two yrs col-lev Span

subject: VENZ
name: Span: Venezuelan Literature
info: Venezuelan literature, from 1950 to present. Different styles of literary expression. Principal authors, works, and literary groups.
